citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 p.m. on
05-Jan-17. No contact was made with any person at the facility. The licensee was contacted by phone and stated
no one was available to accompany during the inspection.
